heading: Pub Trivia
overview: Play a synchronous trivia game with family or friends. Signup to trakc stats or create your own questions. Text or share an invite code to invite others to play with you!
tech: React, Express, MySQL, sequelize, socket.io, Twillio, Heroku

heading: FairyTale Audio Tours
overview: Listen to history, geography or family lore narrated by a member of the community. Login to create audio tours and share your thoughts and ideas with others
tech: JQuery, MySQL, sequelize, Express, Heroku, node.js

heading: Traliz - Get out and about!
overview: Get out and about! Hiking, biking or camping NC has it all. Use our website to find trails, or camping spots near you anywhere in the state. Save them to your favorites to access them again and again
